name: neutralizing-gas
effect: While the Pokémon is in the battle, the effects of all other Pokémon’s Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.
short_effect: Neutralizes abilities of all Pokémon in battle.
flavor_text: If the Pokémon with Neutralizing Gas is in the battle, the effects of all Pokémon’s Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.
